From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Indian horror film


Haunted HillsDirected bySanjeev Kumar RajputWritten bySanjeev Kumar RajputProduced byRavi Kant DixitShashi Kant DixitBanwari Lal DixitShailendra DixitStarringZuber K. Khan[1]  Diana Khan  Gavie Chahal  Surendra Pal SinghCinematographySantosh PalEdited byAzeem PashaMusic byGaurav SandeepRelease date
28 February 2020 (2020-02-28)
Running time102 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageEnglish
Haunted Hills (transl. हॉन्टेड हिल्स)[2] is an Indian Hindi-language horror romantic film, written and directed by Sanjeev Kumar Rajput.[3] The films stars Zuber K. Khan and Diana Khan in the lead roles.[4][5]


Cast[edit]
Zuber K. Khan[6][7] as Rohit
Gavie Chahal
Diana Khan[8][9]
Krishna Chaturvedi
Mansi Gupta
Surendra Pal Singh
Adarsh Kumar
Nitin Dixit
Omkar Sharma
Plot[edit]
Haunted Hills revolves around a honeymooning couple. The wife dies accidentally, and her soul remains in a painting that she leaves incomplete.[10]

Production[edit]
This film was shot in Nainital and Mussoorie in Uttarakhand (India).

Soundtrack[edit]
Haunted HillsSoundtrack album by Gaurav SandeepReleased14 February 2020 (2020-02-14)Recorded2019-2020GenreFeature film soundtrackLength3:43LanguageHindiLabelRed Ribbon MusikExternal audio Video on YouTube
The music of the film is composed by Asif Chandwani and sung by singers including Palak Muchhal, Mohammed Irfan and Dev Negi. 

No.TitleLyricsMusicSinger(s)Length1."Iss Dil Ko Thoda" (Hindi)Sandeep JaiswalVipin SharmaRahul MeharGaurav SandeepMohammed Irfan03:432."Har Raahaton" (Hindi)Sandeep JaiswalGaurav SandeepPalak Muchhal-Total length:3:43
Release[edit]
The film was released in India on 28 February 2020.[11]
The film was premiered on Zee Cinema on 15 November 2020.
